body:
## What's Changed
* Switch to pnpm; Update CRA by @rob-gordon in https://github.com/tone-row/flowchart-fun/pull/329
* require email for sending feedback by @rob-gordon in https://github.com/tone-row/flowchart-fun/pull/330
* only lint staged files by @rob-gordon in https://github.com/tone-row/flowchart-fun/pull/331
* v1.11.0 by @rob-gordon in https://github.com/tone-row/flowchart-fun/pull/332


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/tone-row/flowchart-fun/compare/1.10.3...1.11.0

name: v1.1.0
body: - Export to mermaid.js

name: v1.0.1
body:
- fonts are now embedded in SVG's
- fixed rendering bug with graphs having +150 nodes
- fixed a UI bug where modals wouldn't close on navigation
- fixed a UI bug of Editor comments in dark mode
- fixed a UI bug where changing dark and light mode across tabs wouldn't re-render the editor
- added improved Chinese translations

name: v1.0.0
body:
(Proper versioning to come)

### Changelog

- two new themes, Excalidraw and Monospace
- async theme (font) loader
- new Help tab, integrated with Notion
- remove plausible events, leave basic analytics
- add orange
- add circle (though still needs a bit of work)
